attributes.action: Reverse the Dangerous Coronavirus Bill (HC Bill 122) (Rushed through Parliament)
attributes.additional_details:
YESTERDAY The emergency Coronavirus Bill was rushed through as law. The powers will affect your freedom and take away your rights.

Please look at  Corona virus bill (HC Bill 122)
attributes.background: Review the emergency corona virus bill that you have rushed through parliament and consider what you are doing in terms of human rights.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we are not sure if you would like the Coronavirus Bill to be reversed or reviewed. The legislation already contains the ability for Parliament to conduct 6 month reviews on the operation of the powers.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
